text: Hovhannes Sargsyan (born 14 November 1987) is an Armenian cross-country skier. He competed in the men's sprint event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Armenian male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Armenia Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gyumri
title: Hovhannes Sargsyan
